languages.text: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, their attack limit is removed until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but every one of their attacks also deals <u>10% of the wearer's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the wearer.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy with a melee attack, their attack limit is removed until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but every one of their attacks also deals <u>10% of the wearer's maximum wounds</u> direct damage to the wearer.

Whenever the wearer kills an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, their attack limit is removed until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but every one of their attacks also deals <u>10% of the wearer's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the wearer.

Whenever the wearer kills an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, their attack limit is removed until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but every one of their attacks also deals <u>10% of the wearer's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the wearer.

languages.text: 当装备者通过{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}击杀敌人之后，装备者在本{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内的近战攻击不再有次数限制，但每次进行额外攻击时，都会承受等同于<u>最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}10%{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}</u>的直击伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, their attack limit is removed until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but every one of their attacks also deals <u>10% of the wearer's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the wearer.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者击杀敌人之后，装备者在本{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战攻击{/g}不再有次数限制，但每次额外攻击都会消耗最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}的10%。

languages.text: При совершении убийства в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} число атак персонажа до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} становится неограниченным, но с каждой атакой персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямой урон{/g}, равный <u>10% от максимального {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} персонажа</u>.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy, the number of their {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attacks{/g} becomes unlimited until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but every attack additionally costs 10% of maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: При совершении убийства число атак персонажа {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}в ближнем бою{/g} до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} становится неограниченным, но с каждой атакой персонаж теряет 10% от своего {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}.

При совершении убийства число атак персонажа {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}в ближнем бою{/g} до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} становится неограниченным, но с каждой атакой персонаж теряет 10% от своего {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}.

languages.text: 使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}で敵を倒すと、{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}が終わるまで攻撃制限がなくなるが、 攻撃するたびに<u>使用者の最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷耐性{/g}の10%</u>が{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}として使用者に与えられる。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, their attack limit is removed until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but every one of their attacks also deals <u>10% of the wearer's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the wearer.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が敵をキルするたびに、{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時まで{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}が無制限となるが、攻撃のたびに最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷{/g}の10％を追加で消費する。

languages.text: Si el portador mata a un enemigo con un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, su límite de ataques se elimina hasta finalizar su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, pero cada ataque que lance inflige un <u>10 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} máximas</u> como {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g} al portador.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, their attack limit is removed until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but every one of their attacks also deals <u>10% of the wearer's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the wearer.

traits.locale_text: Si el portador elimina a un enemigo, la cantidad de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} será ilimitada hasta finalizar su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, pero cada ataque cuesta un 10 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} máximas adicional.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger einen Feind mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} tötet, wird sein Angriffslimit bis zum Ende seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} entfernt, aber jeder Angriff verursacht beim Träger <u>10 % der maximalen {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} des Trägers</u> an {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}Direktschaden{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, their attack limit is removed until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but every one of their attacks also deals <u>10% of the wearer's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the wearer.

traits.locale_text: immer wenn der Träger einen Feind tötet, ist die Anzahl seiner {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangriffe{/g} bis zum Ende seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} unbegrenzt, aber jeder Angriff kostet zusätzlich 10 % der maximalen {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}.

languages.text: Lorsque l'utilisateur élimine un ennemi avec une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g}, il peut lancer un nombre d'attaques illimité jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, mais chacune de ces attaques inflige également <u>10 % des {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} maximum de l'utilisateur</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g} à l'utilisateur.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, their attack limit is removed until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but every one of their attacks also deals <u>10% of the wearer's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the wearer.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque l'utilisateur élimine un ennemi, il peut lancer un nombre illimité d'{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaques de mêlée{/g} jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, mais chaque attaque lui coûte 10 % de sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} maximum.

Lorsque l'utilisateur élimine un ennemi, il peut lancer un nombre illimité d'{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaques de mêlée{/g} jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, mais chaque attaque lui coûte 10 % de sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} maximum.

languages.text: Takan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısıyla{/g} bir düşmanı öldürdüğünde saldırı sınırı {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonuna dek kalkar ancak saldırılarından her biri kendisine <u>takan kişinin maksimum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanının %10'u</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}doğrudan hasar{/g} verir.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer kills an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, their attack limit is removed until the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, but every one of their attacks also deals <u>10% of the wearer's maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the wearer.
